content:
The Pesach Langsam Family


Pesach Langsam married Tauba Bina and had at least three children.

  • Meyer married a cousin, a Langsam. She died young and he married her sister, Sarah Langsam (c.1870 - 1942 PIH). She was the daughter of Aaron Leib Bachman and Gittel Langsam (Grumet?), of Dzwiniacz, near Ustry Donle.
    • girl
    • Pesach
    • Hula
    • Pessel married Saul Asher Knepper and they had two known children.
      Yenta & Yitzchok
    • Reisli married Abraham Sturm and they had four known children.
      Tauba Grossinger, Pessel/Pnina, Aron & Malka/Marie Dzjamba
    • Sheindel Rina married Wigdor Moses Bernstein.
    • David married Hinda Mirla Ingber and they had one son. He changed his surname from Langsam to Loren.
      Mark Loren
    • Esther married David Krupf and they had two known children.
      Yacov & Camille
    • Chaya/Clara married Mania Trachtman.
    • Asher married Ruth and they had one known son.
      Ze'ev
    • Pinchus married Bella Perelberger.
  • Samuel had two known children.
    • Lazar
    • Yacov had two known children.
      Pesach & Israel
  • Sarah married Hersh Mylech Keel. They had more than three children.
    • Pessel
    • Rosa
    • Mindel/Mania
    • child


I would be very interested to hear from anyone with knowledge or an interest in the Miller family.

Moishe Miller
moishe@langsam.com

My home address is
           1374 East 28th Street
           Brooklyn NY 11210-5311
           USA

Last updated 10/29/02
